system.requirements:
Tier 2; Two-Weapon Wielder
Aptitudes: Finesse, Offence
system.effect: When making their second ranged attack action from dual wielding in the same turn against the same target as the first attack was made against, the character gains a +20 to the attack if their first attack had at least one successful hit.
